ObjectRecognition: yes. models targets + deep learning targets note:To recognize 3d objects: needs to be opaque, solid, few moving parts, high contrast coloring, convex, uniform shape.

MarkerTracking: yes. ArUCO provides a robust and fast camera pose estimation.
